title: Submit a Report
subtitle: Your report will be handled confidentially

category.label: What is this about?
category.hint: Choose the category that best describes your concern

description.label: What happened?
description.placeholder: Please describe the situation in detail...
description.hint: Include who, what, when, where, and how if known

peopleInvolved.label: Who is involved?
peopleInvolved.placeholder: Names, titles, or descriptions of people involved
peopleInvolved.hint: Include anyone who was involved or witnessed the situation

attachments.label: Supporting Documents
attachments.hint: Upload any relevant files (photos, documents, screenshots)
attachments.dropzone: Drag and drop files here, or click to browse

anonymity.title: How would you like to identify yourself?

anonymous.title: Anonymous
anonymous.description: Your identity will not be collected or known

confidential.title: Confidential
confidential.description: Your identity will be protected but known to investigators

identified.title: Identified
identified.description: Your identity will be shared with relevant parties

confirmation.title: Report Submitted
confirmation.subtitle: Your report has been received

accessCode.title: Your Access Code
accessCode.instructions: Use this code to check the status of your report and communicate with investigators. Please save it now - it will not be shown again.

nextSteps.title: What happens next?
nextSteps.step1: Your report will be reviewed by the appropriate team
nextSteps.step2: You may receive follow-up questions through the secure messaging system
nextSteps.step3: Check back using your access code for updates

confirmation.acknowledgment: I understand I need to save my access code to check the status of my report

validation.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
validation.fileTypeNotAllowed: This file type is not allowed

prompts.moreDetail: Would you like to add more details? Additional context helps investigators understand the situation better.

draft.saveCodeInstructions: Use this code to resume your draft on another device
draft.enterCode: Enter your save code to continue
